QAPair.Question: What is (are) Kidney stones - lithotripsy - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: A kidney stone is a small solid mass made up of tiny crystals. You had a medical procedure called lithotripsy to break up the kidney stones. This article gives you advice on what to expect and how to take care of yourself after the procedure.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Kidney stones - lithotripsy - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Kidney stones - lithotripsy - discharge ?
